Melee.Name: Antique Cavalry Dagger
Melee.Description: An elegant, historical dagger with ornate engravings. A collector's gem and a lethal close-quarters weapon.

Melee.Name: Weapon Bat
Melee.Description: A sturdy, traditional wooden baseball bat. It's a versatile tool for both sports and self-defense.

Melee.Name: Weapon Bottle
Melee.Description: A breakable glass bottle that can be used as an improvised weapon. Handle with caution.

Melee.Name: Weapon Crowbar
Melee.Description: A heavy, metal crowbar with a solid grip. Useful for prying and as a blunt force tool.

Melee.Name: Weapon unarmed
Melee.Description: Remove all player weapons from inventory.

Melee.Name: Weapon Flashlight
Melee.Description: A heavy-duty tactical flashlight with a powerful beam. It can be used for illumination or as an improvised striking tool.

Melee.Name: Weapon Golf Club
Melee.Description: A standard golf club with a steel shaft and wooden head. It's not just for golf; it makes for a formidable melee weapon.

Melee.Name: Weapon Hammer
Melee.Description: A heavy-duty hammer with a sturdy handle. Useful for construction work and doubles as a powerful close-quarters weapon.

Melee.Name: Weapon Hatchet
Melee.Description: A deadly hatchet with a solid wooden handle. Ideal for chopping wood and equally effective in close combat.

Melee.Name: Weapon Knuckle
Melee.Description: A set of metal knuckles designed for hand-to-hand combat. Provides an advantage in close-quarters fights.

Melee.Name: Weapon Knife
Melee.Description: A sharp and versatile military-grade knife with a durable blade. Suitable for various tasks, including self-defense in close combat.

Melee.Name: Weapon Machete
Melee.Description: A rugged and versatile machete with a sharp blade. Ideal for cutting through vegetation and equally effective in close combat.

Melee.Name: Weapon Switchblade
Melee.Description: A compact and concealable switchblade knife with a sharp blade. Suitable for various tasks, including self-defense in close combat.

Melee.Name: Weapon Nightstick
Melee.Description: A standard-issue police nightstick made of durable materials. Effective for crowd control and self-defense.

Melee.Name: Weapon Wrench
Melee.Description: A heavy-duty mechanic's wrench with a solid grip. Useful for vehicle repairs and doubles as a formidable melee weapon.

Melee.Name: Weapon Battleaxe
Melee.Description: A menacing battleaxe with a razor-sharp blade and a sturdy handle. Designed for maximum impact in close combat.

Melee.Name: Weapon Pool Cue
Melee.Description: A standard pool cue made from high-quality wood. Doubles as an improvised weapon in a tight spot.

Melee.Name: Weapon Stone Hatchet
Melee.Description: A crude but effective stone hatchet with a sharp edge. A primitive weapon suitable for survival situations.

Melee.Name: Weapon Candy Cane
Melee.Description: A festive and oversized candy cane. While it's not a conventional weapon, it can still pack a sweet punch in a holiday brawl.

Handguns.Name: Pistol Mk1
Handguns.Description: A standard semi-automatic pistol chambered for 9mm rounds. A versatile sidearm suitable for self-defense and concealed carry.

Handguns.Name: Pistol Mk2
Handguns.Description: An advanced semi-automatic pistol with enhanced features and customization options. Ideal for tactical use.

Handguns.Name: Combat Pistol
Handguns.Description: A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol with improved accuracy and handling. Suitable for both law enforcement and personal defense.

Handguns.Name: AP Pistol
Handguns.Description: A fully-automatic, high-capacity pistol chambered for 9mm rounds. Ideal for rapid fire in close-quarters combat.

Handguns.Name: Stun Gun
Handguns.Description: A non-lethal electroshock weapon used for incapacitating targets by delivering an electric shock.

Handguns.Name: Pistol .50
Handguns.Description: A high-caliber semi-automatic pistol chambered for .50 caliber rounds. Packs a serious punch with excellent stopping power.

Handguns.Name: SNS Pistol
Handguns.Description: A compact and lightweight semi-automatic pistol chambered for .45 ACP rounds. Suitable for concealed carry and close-quarters engagements.

Handguns.Name: SNS Pistol Mk2
Handguns.Description: An upgraded version of the compact and lightweight semi-automatic pistol chambered for .45 ACP rounds. Offers improved performance and customization options.

Handguns.Name: Heavy Pistol
Handguns.Description: A powerful semi-automatic pistol chambered for .45 ACP rounds. Known for its stopping power and accuracy.

Handguns.Name: Vintage Pistol
Handguns.Description: A classic and stylish semi-automatic pistol chambered for .45 ACP rounds. A collector's item with respectable performance.

Handguns.Name: Flare Gun
Handguns.Description: A firearm that fires incendiary flares. Often used for signaling but can also be a tool for setting fires.

Handguns.Name: Marksman Pistol
Handguns.Description: A specialized semi-automatic pistol chambered for high-velocity rounds. Designed for precision shooting at longer ranges.

Handguns.Name: Revolver
Handguns.Description: A classic and powerful six-shot revolver chambered for .45 Colt rounds. Known for its reliability and stopping power.

Handguns.Name: Revolver Mk2
Handguns.Description: An upgraded version of the classic six-shot revolver chambered for .45 Colt rounds. Offers improved performance and customization options.

Handguns.Name: Double Action Revolver
Handguns.Description: A modern double-action revolver chambered for .357 Magnum rounds. Known for its quick firing speed and accuracy.

Handguns.Name: Up-n-Atomizer
Handguns.Description: A handheld ray gun with the ability to launch targets into the air. Great for causing chaos and entertaining mayhem.

Handguns.Name: Ceramic Pistol
Handguns.Description: A sleek and lightweight ceramic pistol designed for stealth and discretion. Its non-metallic construction makes it ideal for covert operations.

Handguns.Name: Navy Revolver
Handguns.Description: A classic-style six-shot revolver chambered for .36 caliber rounds. Known for its historical design and accuracy.

Handguns.Name: Perico Pistol
Handguns.Description: A semi-automatic pistol inspired by the iconic WWII luger design. Known for its reliability and historical charm.

Handguns.Name: Stun Gun
Handguns.Description: A non-lethal electroshock weapon used for incapacitating targets by delivering an electric shock.

Handguns.Name: Pistol XM3
Handguns.Description: A semi-automatic pistol with a classic design. Known for its reliability and timeless appeal.

Submachines.Name: Micro SMG
Submachines.Description: A compact and fully automatic submachine gun chambered for 9mm rounds. Known for its high rate of fire and portability.

Submachines.Name: SMG
Submachines.Description: A compact and fully automatic submachine gun chambered for 9mm rounds. Ideal for close-quarters combat and rapid fire.

Submachines.Name: SMG Mk II
Submachines.Description: An upgraded version of the compact and fully automatic submachine gun chambered for 9mm rounds. Features enhanced performance and customization options.

Submachines.Name: Assault SMG
Submachines.Description: A compact and fully automatic submachine gun chambered for 5.56mm rounds. Known for its high rate of fire and versatility in close to mid-range combat.

Submachines.Name: Combat PDW
Submachines.Description: A compact and fully automatic personal defense weapon chambered for 5.56mm rounds. Ideal for close-quarters combat and rapid fire.

Submachines.Name: Machine Pistol
Submachines.Description: A compact and fully automatic machine pistol chambered for 9mm rounds. Ideal for close-quarters combat and rapid fire.

Submachines.Name: Mini SMG
Submachines.Description: A compact and fully automatic submachine gun chambered for 9mm rounds. Designed for concealed carry and close-quarters combat.

Submachines.Name: Unholy Hellbringer
Submachines.Description: An energy-based weapon with a high rate of fire and devastating power. Capable of sustained fire and great for crowd control.

Submachines.Name: Tactical SMG
Submachines.Description: A compact and fully automatic submachine gun chambered for 5.56mm rounds. Designed for tactical use with a focus on accuracy and versatility.

Shotguns.Name: Pump Shotgun
Shotguns.Description: A classic pump-action shotgun chambered for 12-gauge shells. Known for its stopping power at close range.

Shotguns.Name: Pump Shotgun Mk II
Shotguns.Description: An advanced version of the classic pump-action shotgun chambered for 12-gauge shells. Offers improved performance and customization options.

Shotguns.Name: Sawed-Off Shotgun
Shotguns.Description: A compact double-barreled shotgun with shortened barrels, chambered for 12-gauge shells. Known for its devastating power at close range.

Shotguns.Name: Assault Shotgun
Shotguns.Description: A fully automatic shotgun chambered for 12-gauge shells. Ideal for suppressing enemy targets with rapid fire.

Shotguns.Name: Bullpup Shotgun
Shotguns.Description: A compact and fully automatic shotgun chambered for 12-gauge shells. Known for its high rate of fire and portability.

Shotguns.Name: Musket
Shotguns.Description: A muzzle-loading long-barreled rifle with exceptional range and accuracy, chambered for a single 10-gauge shot. Ideal for historical reenactments and long-range shots.

Shotguns.Name: Heavy Shotgun
Shotguns.Description: A pump-action shotgun chambered for 12-gauge shells. Known for its power and effective range, making it suitable for heavy-duty applications.

Shotguns.Name: Double Barrel Shotgun
Shotguns.Description: A break-action shotgun with two barrels, chambered for 12-gauge shells. Known for its raw stopping power at close range.

Shotguns.Name: Sweeper Shotgun
Shotguns.Description: A fully automatic shotgun chambered for 12-gauge shells. Ideal for delivering a continuous hail of pellets in close-quarters combat.

Shotguns.Name: Combat Shotgun
Shotguns.Description: A pump-action shotgun chambered for 12-gauge shells. Known for its versatility and reliability in various combat situations.

Assault Rifles.Name: Assault Rifle
Assault Rifles.Description: A fully automatic assault rifle chambered for intermediate cartridges. Versatile and effective in a variety of combat scenarios.

Assault Rifles.Name: Assault Rifle Mk II
Assault Rifles.Description: An advanced version of the fully automatic assault rifle chambered for intermediate cartridges. Features enhanced performance and customization options.

Assault Rifles.Name: Carbine Rifle
Assault Rifles.Description: A standard-issue carbine rifle known for its reliability and versatility.

Assault Rifles.Name: Carbine Rifle Mk II
Assault Rifles.Description: An advanced version of the carbine rifle with improved features and customization options.

Assault Rifles.Name: Advanced Rifle
Assault Rifles.Description: A highly accurate and rapid-firing assault rifle designed for combat situations.

Assault Rifles.Name: Special Carbine
Assault Rifles.Description: A versatile and customizable carbine rifle with special modifications for enhanced performance.

Assault Rifles.Name: Special Carbine Mk II
Assault Rifles.Description: An advanced version of the special carbine rifle with improved features and customization options.

Assault Rifles.Name: Bullpup Rifle
Assault Rifles.Description: A compact and ergonomic bullpup rifle known for its handling and accuracy.

Assault Rifles.Name: Bullpup Rifle Mk II
Assault Rifles.Description: An advanced version of the bullpup rifle with improved features and customization options.

Assault Rifles.Name: Compact Rifle
Assault Rifles.Description: A lightweight and compact rifle designed for close-quarters combat.

Assault Rifles.Name: Military Rifle
Assault Rifles.Description: A military-grade rifle known for its durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

Assault Rifles.Name: Heavy Rifle
Assault Rifles.Description: A heavy-duty rifle designed for maximum firepower and impact.

Assault Rifles.Name: Tactical Rifle
Assault Rifles.Description: A versatile and tactical rifle suitable for a variety of combat scenarios.

Light Machine Guns.Name: MG
Light Machine Guns.Description: A standard-issue machine gun known for its firepower and reliability.

Light Machine Guns.Name: Combat MG
Light Machine Guns.Description: A heavy-duty machine gun designed for combat situations, offering rapid fire and precision.

Light Machine Guns.Name: Combat MG Mk II
Light Machine Guns.Description: An advanced version of the combat machine gun with improved features, accuracy, and customization options.

Light Machine Guns.Name: Gusenberg Sweeper
Light Machine Guns.Description: A vintage-style machine gun, known for its unique appearance and reliable performance.

Sniper rifles.Name: Sniper Rifle
Sniper rifles.Description: A long-range precision rifle favored by sharpshooters for its accuracy and power.

Sniper rifles.Name: Heavy Sniper
Sniper rifles.Description: A heavy-caliber sniper rifle designed for long-range engagements with devastating stopping power.

Sniper rifles.Name: Heavy Sniper Mk II
Sniper rifles.Description: An advanced version of the heavy sniper rifle with improved features, accuracy, and customization options.

Sniper rifles.Name: Marksman Rifle
Sniper rifles.Description: A versatile semi-automatic rifle, ideal for mid-range precision shooting.

Sniper rifles.Name: Marksman Rifle Mk II
Sniper rifles.Description: An advanced version of the marksman rifle with improved features, accuracy, and customization options.

Sniper rifles.Name: Precision Rifle
Sniper rifles.Description: A specialized precision rifle designed for accurate long-range shooting.

Heavy Weapons.Name: RPG
Heavy Weapons.Description: A portable rocket launcher capable of delivering explosive firepower to both vehicles and targets.

Heavy Weapons.Name: Grenade Launcher
Heavy Weapons.Description: A launcher that fires explosive grenades, suitable for dealing with groups of enemies or vehicles.

Heavy Weapons.Name: Smoke Grenade Launcher
Heavy Weapons.Description: A specialized grenade launcher that fires smoke grenades for tactical cover.

Heavy Weapons.Name: Minigun
Heavy Weapons.Description: A rapid-firing, high-powered machine gun capable of tearing through enemies and vehicles.

Heavy Weapons.Name: Firework Launcher
Heavy Weapons.Description: A special launcher designed to shoot colorful fireworks into the sky for festive occasions.

Heavy Weapons.Name: Railgun
Heavy Weapons.Description: An experimental electromagnetic launcher capable of delivering powerful, high-velocity shots.

Heavy Weapons.Name: Homing Launcher
Heavy Weapons.Description: A missile launcher with homing capabilities, designed for taking down airborne targets.

Heavy Weapons.Name: Compact Grenade Launcher
Heavy Weapons.Description: A small, portable grenade launcher that packs a punch and is easy to carry.

Heavy Weapons.Name: Widowmaker
Heavy Weapons.Description: A powerful rapid-firing energy weapon, capable of sustained fire and significant damage.

Heavy Weapons.Name: Compact EMP Launcher
Heavy Weapons.Description: A compact electromagnetic pulse launcher designed to disable electronic systems.

Throwables.Name: Grenade
Throwables.Description: A throwable explosive device that detonates after a short delay.

Throwables.Name: BZ Gas
Throwables.Description: A canister releasing a non-lethal but disorienting gas, ideal for crowd control.

Throwables.Name: Molotov Cocktail
Throwables.Description: A homemade incendiary weapon that creates a fiery explosion on impact.

Throwables.Name: Sticky Bomb
Throwables.Description: An adhesive explosive device that can be attached to surfaces and remotely detonated.

Throwables.Name: Proximity Mines
Throwables.Description: Mines that detonate when an enemy comes within close proximity, useful for creating traps.

Throwables.Name: Snowballs
Throwables.Description: A handful of snowballs, perfect for wintertime fun.

Throwables.Name: Pipe Bombs
Throwables.Description: Homemade explosive devices with a short fuse, suitable for causing chaos.

Throwables.Name: Baseball
Throwables.Description: A standard baseball, great for playing sports or causing mischief.

Throwables.Name: Tear Gas
Throwables.Description: A canister releasing a noxious gas that causes disorientation and discomfort.

Throwables.Name: Flare
Throwables.Description: A signal flare used for signaling or creating bright illumination.

Throwables.Name: Acid Package
Throwables.Description: A specialized package containing corrosive materials, used for unique applications.

Miscellaneous.Name: Jerry Can
Miscellaneous.Description: A portable canister filled with flammable liquid, useful for creating fires or fueling vehicles.

Miscellaneous.Name: Parachute
Miscellaneous.Description: A lifesaving device that allows you to glide safely from great heights.

Miscellaneous.Name: Fire Extinguisher
Miscellaneous.Description: A device used to put out fires quickly and efficiently.

Miscellaneous.Name: Hazardous Jerry Can
Miscellaneous.Description: A specialized canister filled with hazardous materials, handle with caution.

Miscellaneous.Name: Fertilizer Can
Miscellaneous.Description: A container filled with fertilizer, suitable for farming and agricultural activities.
